rows.label: tlk4130009102_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, thanks for visiting!
And thanks as well for telling us
about Rhiannon's family.

rows.label: tlk4130009102_msg0002
rows.name:
Rhiannon's da wasn't willing to talk
to me before, but her ma managed to
persuade him.

rows.label: tlk4130009102_msg0003
rows.name:
She said if the two of us can be happy,
then maybe that'll pave the way for
our countries to live in harmony too.

rows.label: tlk4130009102_msg0004
rows.name:
After that, I told them all about our
plans and they approved of us getting
married! You've helped us so much...
